sys_ui_message.key: The currency of the expense report is always in CHF. If necessary, use the official exchange rate to indicate the amount to be reimbursed in CHF.
sys_ui_message.message: La devise de la note de frais est toujours en CHF. Si besoin, utilisez le taux de change officiel pour indiquer le montant Ã rembourser en CHF.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: The currency of the expense report is always in CHF. If necessary, use the official exchange rate to indicate the amount to be reimbursed in CHF.
